title: Context Index Schema
description: Machine-readable catalog of .claude/context files enabling automated discovery, optimized loading, and validation of context resources

generated_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp when index was last generated

file_count.description: Total number of indexed context files

domain.description: Top-level domain: 'core' for system orchestration, 'project' for domain-specific

topics.description: Primary topics covered (1-5 items for semantic matching)

summary.description: Brief description of file contents (20-200 characters)

load_when.description: Conditions under which this file should be loaded

line_count.description: Approximate line count for context budgeting

deprecated.description: Whether this file is deprecated (default: false)

replaces.description: Paths of files this entry replaces (for migration tracking)

languages.description: Task languages that should load this file ('any' matches all languages)

operations.description: Operation types that should load this file ('any' matches all operations)

tiers.description: Context tiers that should load this file ('any' matches all tiers)

agents.description: Specific agents that should load this file (e.g., 'lean-research-agent')

conditions.description: Free-form conditions (e.g., 'when proof stuck', 'when creating new agents')

load_conditions.description: Multi-dimensional loading conditions for context selection

entries.summary: Command File Structure: Commands as Agents with Workflows
Schema for debug reports generated during team implementation debugging cycles.
This document defines the core orchestration patterns for ProofChecker's command-skill-agent architecture:
All workflow commands (`/research`, `/plan`, `/revise`, `/implement`) MUST execute postflight in Stage 3.5 after validating subagent returns in Stage 3.
All workflow commands (`/research`, `/plan`, `/revise`, `/implement`) MUST execute preflight in Stage 1.5 before delegating work to subagents.
